attributes.action: because of the expences scandel, the prime minister should disolve parliament and let the people decide.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the continuing debacle over expences has brought parliament into desrepute. the only way forward is for the total expences to be published in full without any exceptions. the prime minister should disolve parliament and let the people decide at a general election, called as soon as possible.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
